PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2024-01062024-02-02PCH
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DAVID GOLDBLOOM of Toronto, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Katherine Jean Hambly, whose term has expired.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Approval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DAVID GOLDBLOOM of Toronto, Ontario, to be a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Immigration at Pier 21, to hold office during pleasure for a term of four years, in the place of Katherine Jean Hambly, whose term has expired.
